All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AccountingHandler
Handles the external accounting system.
CashRegister
 
Controller
Controller class, handles communication between view and model.
DiscountHandler
Handles the discount database.
InventoryHandler
Handles the external inverntory system.
ItemDTO
Represents a Data Transfer Object (DTO) for an item in the inventory.
Main
The entry point of the application.
Receipt
Represents a receipt for a completed sale.
ReceiptPrinter
Handles the external system receipt printer.
Sale
Represents a single sale transaction, including the items sold, their quantities, the total price, and the total VAT.
View
View class, handles interaction with the user.
